ygData.subject: Re: Happanings at BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: Silver Scout was ready this time. she rolled to her feat jumping into the air causeing two shots to pass under her. the next shot pushed her back to the floor

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Silver Scout was ready this time. she rolled to her feat jumping into the
air causeing two shots to pass under her. the next shot pushed her back to
the floor sending her sliding into the wall. the fourth shot went passed her
and headed toward Bullet. The mutant saw a flaw to her tactics, she had just
pinned herself between Kit Kat and the other Predacons.(remember Robo
whatever shots miss Silver Scout are headed towards Kit Kat2)

Bullet crossed his arms deflecting the shot. his arm singed from the impact.
"Be more carefull with that thing would you?" he shouted toward Kit Kat.
There were to many bots in the halls to be endangered by friendly fire.

Blaze aimed her disruptor, firing at the intruder three times.

Silver Scout moved quickly as she could trying to avoid any further damage.
To many shots flew through the hallway to tell who was fireing or when.
Blacknightmares stun blasts weakened her, Blazes disruptor scrambled her
circuitry, and Enders sidearms pierced her organics causing more of the
strange red energeon to flow from her form. She transformed to her hawk form
and attempted to escape but no sooner had she left the ground that she lost
her strength and collapsed back to the floor of the Black Fortress.
